title: DI Evaluatable Element
description: (DRAFT) -- Represents an evaluatable component of a Runnable Model in a CDM, for OpenDI-compliant software. Used for simulation/computation.

meta.title: Asset Metadata
meta.description: Metadata shared by all DI Assets

items.title: Input Value UUIDs
items.description: UUIDs for Inputs used by this eval element. To be fed into the specified function.

items.title: Output Value UUIDs
items.description: UUIDs for Outputs used by this eval element. Updated by the specified function.

functionName.title: Function Name
functionName.description: Name of the function used in the referenced Evaluatable Asset. Inputs are passed into this function, and outputs are populated by it.

apiCacheSize.title: API Cache Size
apiCacheSize.description: Maximum number of entries allowed for this evaluatable element in the cache of API results. Set to 0 if you want this evaluatable element to always re-send API requests.

evaluatableAsset.title: Evaluatable Asset
evaluatableAsset.description: UUID for the Evaluatable Asset used by this Evaluatable Element.

addons.title: Addon Data
addons.description: Object containing data for various addons.
